Help:Node.title: General Concepts: Loudness
Help:Node.Log:Description:
Title: Loudness
Important Commands: say, scream, shout, whisper
Syntax: "$(udat.chatchar)whisper to [person], '[message]'"; "$(udat.chatchar)shout to [person], '[test]'"
Different evocations have different volumes associated with them. If you whisper something to someone, it's private, but if you shout everyone will hear, possibly even those in adjoining rooms.
Eventually we plan to implement a system of sound that associates a different sound level with every evocation verb and adverb; for now, however, your $(udat.chatchar)WHISPERed speeches are totally private.
See Also: Adverbs, Communicate, Proximity
